name: Britney Spears Midnight Fantasy
shortDescription: Britney Spears Midnight Fantasy Women EDP 30ml
description: Opening the scent is a delightful blend of plum and black cherry with framboise, another name for the tangy red raspberry. The heart then blooms with a floral trio of night orchid, freesia and iris before ending with a solid based of vanilla, musk and amber. Together, these essences weave an aromatic profile full of night flowers and decadent fruit, and a gorgeous blue-hued bottle studded with Swarowski crystals suggests a tantalizing effect for wearers.

name: Britney Spears Curious
description: Showcase your vibrant and outgoing side with the fruity and floral aroma of Curious by Britney Spears. The fragrance begins strongly with the heady scent of Louisiana magnolia. Seductive and mildly sweet, it is both charming and intoxicating. Smooth vanilla lends another layer of sweetness, with a milky soft finish. A subtle musk drifts behind, forming a lingering base note evoking mischief and, of course, curiosity.

name: Britney Spears Believe
description: Believe is an addictive and seductive Oriental Woody Amber scent with an irresistible gourmand twist. Exotic, contemporary notes like Latex Petals and Red Calla Lily weave the refreshing fruit-forward top notes and warm woody base notes into a seamless gender-neutral composition..

name: David Beckham Beyond Forever
description: Beyond Forever Eau de Toilette by David Beckham is a vibrant and masculine scent ideal for the day or the night, based on the modern man, forever fearless in the face of new challenges. Beyond Forever opens with vibrant nutmeg and hints of bergamot. The accord's aromatic intensity is balanced by notes of violet and fresh foug√®re. The Eau de Toilette dries down to an elegant finish with notes of patchouli and leather. Crafted of heavy glass with a refined metal cap, the Beyond Forever bottle is as elegant and masculine as the fragrance itself..

name: David Beckham Intimately
description: The Intimately Beckham Eau de Toilette Spray is a fresh spicy fragrance that exudes classiness and the confidence of masculinity. Crafted in 2006, this casual wear perfume for men opens with stimulating and irresistible notes of Grapefruit, Bergamot, and Cardamom at the top. The heart combines spicy scents of Nutmeg and Star Anise with the subtle floral aroma of Violet for a deep, energizing fragrance. Warm, woody notes of Patchouli, Amber, and Sandalwood merge at the base and give a sensual edge to this David Beckham perfume.

name: David Beckham Beyond
description: David Beckham and his talented wife Victoria launched this woody-spicy scent for men from his fragrance house in 2015. The opening sparkles with mojito notes enhanced by cardamom's slightly nutty aroma. A heart featuring cedar and black pepper rests on a warm, smooth base highlighting leather for a fragrance spray that lets you dominate your field of endeavor with confidence.

name: Beyonce Midnight Heat
description: Midnight Heat exudes passion in the air and embodies excitement of hot summer nights. It opens with rich fruity flavours of plum from Armenia and star fruit. Branded import. The real thing at unreal prices.

name: Beyonce Heat Rush EDT 100ml
description: Beyonce Heat Rush Eau de Toilette 100ml. Experience the rush of Beyonce Heat Rush. As it touches the skin this perfume illuminates the wearer making them feel energised and alive. With opening notes of passionfruit sorbet, blood orange and Brazilian cherry, its heart blooms with yellow tiger orchid, mango blossom and orange hibiscus, while a warm base closes with teak wood, honey amber and Rio sunset musk.

name: Joop Jump EDT 100ml
description: JOOP! Jump rewards all men who dare to be unconcerned and break out of conventions. They are cultured, but unconventional, masculine and erotic - just like your scent. Citrus and grapefruit tickle in the head note. Extravagant is the heart note with a shot of frozen vodkas. Sensual is the basis of sweet tonka beans.

name: Joop Homme
description: Refined, oriental and woody, Joop is a classic masculine scent that possesses a blend of cinnamon, jasmine, honey, tobacco and vetiver. Recommended for a man who likes to show off his modern individuality!

name: Calvin Klein Obsession
description: Calvin Klein Obsession Men EDT 125ml is a Obsession Aromatic fragrance for men.

name: Calvin Klein Eternity
description: Calvin Klein Eternity Aqua EDT 100ml is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men.

name: Adidas Victory League
description: Adidas Victory League by Adidas is an oriental and woody fragrance for men.  the fragrance features cinnamon, lavender, musk, vanilla, basil, pear, cedar and bergamot.

name: Adidas Team Force
description: Adidas Team Force by Adidas is a Aromatic fragrance for men.

name: Adidas Pure Game
description: For the purists of the game and developed with athletes, comes this Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Top notes are grapefruit, mandarin orange, basil and pepper. Middle notes are lavender, guaiac wood and cypress. Base notes are sandalwood, patchouli, incense and tonka bean.

name: Adidas Dynamic Pulse
description: Opening the scent is a delightful blend of plum and black cherry with framboise, another name for the tangy red raspberry. The heart then blooms with a floral trio of night orchid, freesia and iris before ending with a solid based of vanilla, musk and amber. Together, these essences weave an aromatic profile full of night flowers and decadent fruit, and a gorgeous blue-hued bottle studded with Swarowski crystals suggests a tantalizing effect for wearers.
